title: Representative Sample
text: One of the key purposes of sampling from the population is to attempt to get a representative sample.

title: Exclusion of Participants
text: The population that is being sampled should include all participants that should be included, not the ones to be excluded.

title: Choosing at Random
text: This refers to random sampling, which may not always be representative for a population.

title: Fitting Population Contours
text: This suggests that all participants fit certain criteria, which would not be a sampling procedure.
